title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 ยง 2397.8 - Administrative and judicial proceedings
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 ยง 2397.8 - Administrative and judicial proceedings

State Regulations

The provisions of subdivision 3-a of section
170
and sections
288, 288-a, 315, 1138, 1140
and
1250
of the Tax Law shall apply in the
event a taxpayer wishes to protest any action taken by the commissioner or the
department as a result of this Part which gives rise to a right to a hearing
under the Tax Law. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20
ยง
2397.8

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
